trip_name.description: Name of the trip, must be 1-100 characters.

start_date.description: Start date of the trip in YYYY-MM-DD format.

end_date.description: End date of the trip in YYYY-MM-DD format.

location_city.description: City associated with the trip, must be 1-100 characters.

location_country.description: Country associated with the trip, must be 1-100 characters.
